channel.title: [PI] ::pnpcother command
channel.description: How could I make a ::pnpcother command that would be used like... "::pnpcother (playername) (npc Id)" or vise versa... Please let me know, Id like this command to turn another player into the npc of my selecting...

item.title: [PI] ::pnpcother command
